tool_description: API for the range of the BAS-IP multiapartment panels
name: BAS-IP multiapartment panels
title: BAS-IP multiapartment panels

api_list.name: /frontend/version
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bas-ip-multiapartment-panels.p.rapidapi.com/frontend/version"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bas-ip-multiapartment-panels.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:

url = "https://bas-ip-multiapartment-panels.p.rapidapi.com/frontend/version"

headers = {

        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

autostart.description: Starts face recognition when motion detected if enabled.

mode.description:
Face recognition mode
- software - use only software to recognize face
- 3D - also use hardware to recognize face

oneOf.description:
Face recognition settings.
Face recognition starts automatically after 10 seconds of inactivity

mode.description:
Face recognition mode
- software - use only software to recognize face
- 3D - also use hardware to recognize face

api_list.name: /login
api_list.description: Used to collect a Token for a registered User

required_parameters.name: password
required_parameters.description: MD5 hash of the password for login (e. g.  123456=E10ADC3949BA59ABBE56E057F20F883E)

api_list.name: /access/timeprofile/items/list

optional_parameters.name: sort_field
optional_parameters.description: Field name (JSON Key in item entity)

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Number of items. Value by default is 10

time_profile_uid.description:
UID for entities referenses.
If value is `-1`, then it means that is no entity reference for this structure

repeat_end.description: `date` key required if `date` format was choosen

uid_items.description: Array of UID for entities referenses.

items.description:
UID for entities referenses.
If value is `-1`, then it means that is no entity reference for this structure

link_id.description: Can be settled only by remote server. By default return null value

filter_value.description: Returns apartments with residents count greater then six

items.description:
One of these variants -
* `NUMBER` - e.g. 1234, when calls transmit to to "sip:1234@your.sip.proxy"
* `SIP URI` - e.g sip:1234@some.sip.proxy
* `LASKOMEX` - e.g. "laskomex:65"
* `VIZIT` - e.g. "vizit:65"

sip_status.description:
* `OK` - SIP is working
* `OFFLINE` - SIP is disabled
* `ERROR` - SIP is enabled, but registration is failure

url = "https://bas-ip-multiapartment-panels.p.rapidapi.com/advanced/notification/button/press/sound"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bas-ip-multiapartment-panels.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
